Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17272268] Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=17.50 μg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=35.00 μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=17.50 μg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=8.75 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Odorranain-T1 adopts 28.2% turn structure in water solution.
Sequence Information.Function: Odorranain-T1 exhibites moderate antimicrobial activities against all of the tested microbes.

Literature.Title: Anti-infection peptidomics of amphibian skin.
Literature.Author: Li J, Xu X, Xu C, Zhou W, Zhang K, Yu H, Zhang Y, Zheng Y, Rees HH, Lai R, Yang D, Wu J.
